channel.title: SSH Problems
channel.description: I've recently installed Scientis Slaughterhouse, and unfortunately when I copy and paste the cfg from the HL folder so controls will work I don't have Tertiary fire! Does anybody know a way around this?

item.title: SSH Problems
item.dc:creator: Brother_Shrike
item.description:
When I saw SSH I assumed Secure Shell.

Try modding the controls from inside the mod. Or modding the CFG itself. I doubt that it has slots for tertiary fire.

Read full topic
